page.title: 05MARKET RASEN-AMENITIES
page.content: The town provides services for a considerable area around it. Besides the railway station which is the nearest for 14 miles, there are the dental surgeries and the Health Centre which provide a first class service to the community with three doctors and three dentists. There is also a branch of the county library. The Police Station,which is the oldest in Lincs. serves an area of 600 square miles with 21 officers based there. The magistrates court sits every second Monday and serves a considerable area. More serious cases are referred to Lincoln Crown Court.There are also offices of the Lincs. Social Services in the town and West Lindsey District Council has an area office there too.The county Fire Brigade has a retained station as does the Ambulance Service.
